data.comment: The match is underway at Banc of California Stadium.
Goal kick for Los Angeles at Banc of California Stadium.
In the minute 1, Free kick Los Angeles.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Los Angeles to take a throw-in in Seattle territory.
In the minute 3, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Mark Anthony Kaye.
Ball safe as Seattle is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Bob Bradley (Los Angeles) has taken off Mark Anthony Kaye who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Andy Najar is the replacement.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Seattle in the half of Los Angeles.
In Los Angeles a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Seattle are coming forward and Kelvin Leerdam gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 9, Los Angeles have a goal kick.
Los Angeles awarded a free kick in their own half.
Los Angeles have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 11, It's a goal kick for the away team in Los Angeles.
Seattle have been awarded a corner by Ramy Touchan.
Ball goes out of play for a Los Angeles goal kick.
Free kick for Seattle in the half of Los Angeles.
In the minute 13, The home team have replaced Andy Najar with Mohammed El Munir. This is the second substitution made today by Bob Bradley.
Ramy Touchan signals a Los Angeles throw-in in Seattle's half.
In the minute 14, Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to Los Angeles.
Los Angeles's Danny Musovski scores with his head to give his side a 1-0 lead.
Great play from Eduard Atuesta to set up the goal.
In the minute 16, Free kick for Los Angeles in their own half.
Throw-in for Los Angeles close to the penalty box.
Ramy Touchan signals a throw-in for Los Angeles, close to Seattle's area.
In the minute 19, Can Los Angeles get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seattle's half?
Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to Seattle in their own half.
At Banc of California Stadium, Francisco Ginella has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 21, Free kick for Seattle in their own half.
Ramy Touchan awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Seattle get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Los Angeles's half?
In the minute 23, Ramy Touchan awards Los Angeles a goal kick.
Ramy Touchan awards Los Angeles a goal kick.
Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to Seattle.
In the minute 25, Can Seattle capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Los Angeles's half?
Seattle's Kelvin Leerdam goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
In Los Angeles a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 28, Ramy Touchan signals a Seattle throw-in in Los Angeles's half.
Throw-in for Seattle in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 31, Throw-in high up the field for Seattle in Los Angeles.
Los Angeles to take a throw-in in Seattle territory.
Los Angeles pushes forward through Francisco Ginella, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 34, Corner awarded to Seattle.
Seattle needs to be cautious. Los Angeles have an attacking throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Seattle goal kick.
In the minute 39, Corner awarded to Los Angeles.
Free kick Los Angeles.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Los Angeles.
In the minute 42, Throw-in for Seattle in the half of Los Angeles.
Seattle's Bradley Shaun Smith attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Los Angeles at Banc of California Stadium.
In the minute 44, Throw-in for Seattle in the half of Los Angeles.
Will Bruin for Seattle gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Los Angeles have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Seattle at Banc of California Stadium.
At Banc of California Stadium the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick for Seattle in the half of Los Angeles.
In the minute 45, Seattle have been awarded a corner by Ramy Touchan.
Seattle have been awarded a corner by Ramy Touchan.
In Los Angeles, Cristian Roldan (Seattle) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 45, Los Angeles have a goal kick.
Ramy Touchan blows to end the first-half.
The second half has started at Banc of California Stadium.
In the minute 46, Bob Bradley (Los Angeles) is making a third substitution, with Christian Torres replacing Adrien Perez.
Seattle awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to Los Angeles in their own half.
In the minute 48, Los Angeles to take a throw-in in Seattle territory.
Throw-in Seattle.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 51, Can Seattle get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Los Angeles's half?
Corner awarded to Los Angeles.
Ramy Touchan awards Seattle a goal kick.
In the minute 57, Los Angeles will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Seattle.
Throw-in high up the field for Seattle in Los Angeles.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Los Angeles.
Seattle have been awarded a corner by Ramy Touchan.
Alex Roldan is on a sub for Jordy Delem for Seattle.
In the minute 58, Nouhou Tolo is replacing Bradley Shaun Smith for Seattle at Banc of California Stadium.
In the minute 59, Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to Seattle.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Los Angeles to check on Eddie Segura, who is grimacing with pain.
Goal kick for Los Angeles at Banc of California Stadium.
In Los Angeles a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 65, Goal! Los Angeles extend their lead to 2-0 through Francisco Ginella.
Danny Musovski instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 66, Eddie Segura for Los Angeles is back on the field again.
Los Angeles awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Los Angeles goal kick.
In the minute 68, Ramy Touchan signals a Los Angeles throw-in in Seattle's half.
Free kick for Seattle in their own half.
Joao Paulo for Seattle drives towards goal at Banc of California Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 73, Corner awarded to Seattle.
Seattle's Nicolas Lodeiro has been booked in Los Angeles.
Throw-in for Seattle close to the penalty box.
In the minute 75, Seattle make their third substitution with Roman Torres replacing Kelvin Leerdam.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Los Angeles.
Free kick Seattle.
In the minute 77, Goal! Nicolas Lodeiro pulls one back for Seattle to make it 2-1.
Free kick for Los Angeles in the half of Seattle.
Joao Paulo (Seattle) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 81, Seattle have a goal kick.
Ramy Touchan awards Los Angeles a goal kick.
Los Angeles awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 84, Danny Musovski puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 3-1.
Ramy Touchan waits before resuming play because Latif Blessing for Los Angeles is still down.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 86, Can Seattle get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Los Angeles's half?
Brian Schmetzer is making the team's fifth substitution at Banc of California Stadium with Miguel Ibarra replacing Will Bruin.
Josh Atencio is replacing Joao Paulo for the away team.
In the minute 88, Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to Seattle.
Latif Blessing returns to the field for Los Angeles after picking up a slight injury.
Mohammed El Munir (Los Angeles) has received a yellow card from Ramy Touchan.
In the minute 89, Ball goes out of play for a Los Angeles goal kick.
Goal kick for Seattle at Banc of California Stadium.
Seattle have been awarded a corner by Ramy Touchan.
6 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Los Angeles.
Throw-in for Seattle in their own half.
Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to Los Angeles in their own half.
Los Angeles have been awarded a corner by Ramy Touchan.
Ball safe as Seattle is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Los Angeles capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Seattle's half?
Seattle needs to be cautious. Los Angeles have an attacking throw-in.
Full-time! The final score is 3-1.
The home team have replaced Bradley Wright-Phillips with Kwadwo Opoku. This is the fourth substitution made today by Bob Bradley.
